mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.varieties, c.average_cost AS averageCost, c.user_rate AS userRate, c.rate_of_total AS rateOfTotal, c.create_time AS createTime, c.create_time AS createTime, c.update_time AS updateTime, c.update_user_id AS updateUserId, s.account as createUserId FROM count_antibiotics AS c LEFT JOIN sys_user AS s ON s.id = c.create_user_id WHERE 1 = 1
and varieties=#{varieties}
